channel.title: Requirements on items
channel.description: I have recently added in many new items into my server. I was so excited to get them all but then a problem arose. anybody could wear them :o and idk how to set requirements on items. some skill capes don't require a lvl and bandos doesn't neither does 3rd age or dfs or helm of neitiznot. help would be great.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 03:07:36 AM[/size][hr]why does no one ever reply to these? i mean you could at least act like you care or something?

item.title: Requirements on items
item.dc:creator: @crucio crucio
item.description:
@crucio wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:3, topic:190508”]1. Use the search button.
2. It’s silab not ilab
3. THERE ARE NO SILAB(ILAB IN YOUR CASE) ITEMS!!! Every moparscape (well runescape) item was made by the same people. Jagex. Silab ripped the images from the runescape cache and added them into her own cache. It’s easy to do…[/quote]

He said lilab not ilab…
